results.title: Simvastatin-induced up-regulation of gap junctions composed of connexin 43 sensitize Leydig tumor cells to etoposide: an involvement of PKC pathway.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@-induced up-regulation of gap junctions composed of @GENE_GJA1 @GENE_2697 @@@connexin 43@@@ sensitize @<m>DISEASE_Leydig_Cell_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007984 @@@Leydig tumor@@@ cells to @CHEMICAL_Etoposide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005047 @@@etoposide@@@: an involvement of @GENE_PRRT2 @GENE_112476 @@@PKC@@@ pathway.

citations.NLM: Wang L, Fu Y, Peng J, Wu D, Yu M, Xu C, Wang Q, Tao L. Simvastatin-induced up-regulation of gap junctions composed of connexin 43 sensitize Leydig tumor cells to etoposide: an involvement of PKC pathway. Toxicology. 2013 Oct 4;312():149-57. PMID: 23978459

results.title: Simvastatin protects Sertoli cells against cisplatin cytotoxicity through enhanced gap junction intercellular communication.
results.text_hl: In a previous study, it was found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ enhanced the sensitivity of @<m>DISEASE_Leydig_Cell_Tumor</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D007984 @@@Leydig tumor@@@ cells to chemotherapeutic @DISEASE_Drug_Related_Side_Effects_and_Adverse_Reactions @DISEASE_MESH:D064420 @@@toxicity@@@ through the enhancement of gap junction functions.

citations.NLM: Wang L, Peng J, Huang H, Wang Q, Yu M, Tao L. Simvastatin protects Sertoli cells against cisplatin cytotoxicity through enhanced gap junction intercellular communication. Oncol Rep. 2015 Oct;34(4):2133-41. PMID: 26260290
